Fianna Fail is still on course to lose substantial numbers of seats in the election, but the popularity of new leader Micheál Martin suggests that a modest recovery in the party's fortunes may be possible, The Sunday Business Post's political editor Pat Leahy said. Larry Page and Sergey are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said. Google has grown over the past decade from a start-up battling other Internet search engines into a technology giant with nearly 25,000 employees and annual revenue of nearly US$ 30 billion. The

to report earnings, excluding items, of$ 8.06 a share, on$ 6.05 billion in revenue.`` Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year,'' Eric Schmidt said in a statement. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. In after-hours trading, shares of Google rose 2.1 percent to$ 639.68, despite having closed Thursday's regular session down 0.8 percent.
